name: Saxa
description:
Story of Horror Game:

A girl named "Saxa", abandoned by her family, is taken to a mental hospital. A week later, the doctors noticed strange and terrible things about the girl, but it was too late for everything, the girl is killing everyone in the hospital, the doctors are scared and they run away.

Your Mission: Find the Clues and Escape the Hospital!

Controls:

W,A,S,D : Movement

E : Open the Door, Examine

F: Interaction

Ctrl: Crouch

Shift: Run

System Requirements:

Operation System: Windows XP, 7, 8, 8.1, 10

Processor: Two-ply Intel i3 CPU @ 1.5GHz +

Memory: 2GB of RAM

Screen card: Intel 3xxx series w / 1 GB VRAM, or better

Hard disk: Area of 300 MB will be able to use
